title: La Route des coffres
overview: Stéphane Rotenberg hid safes containing a total of 100,000 euros in the most unusual, unexpected and extraordinary places in France. To try to find these chests, pairs of adventurers will set off at the wheel of their campervan and travel the roads of France! Along the way, they will have to answer riddles, take on regional challenges but also discover unusual and emblematic places in which the treasures will be hidden.
